Node.id: Equipment needed to play the game

Item.id: basketball is played on a court on a flat surface (grass courts are not allowed)
standard dimensions of the court are 26 m long X 14 m wide (85 ft x 46 ft)
The court is marked by lines which are 5 cm / 2 in in width.

Node.Node: <Node id="each basket has a ring a net/dummy>" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1"> <Item id="is made of solid iron/dummy>" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1"> <Item id="45 cm / 18 in in diameter/dummy>" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1"> <Item id="orange/dummy>" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1"> <Item id="is attached to the backboards in a horizantal plane fixed 3.05 m / 10 ft above the floor /dummy" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1"> <Item id="is best made of white cord/dummy" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1">

Item.id: was orignially installed to prevent the ball going out of play ==> they are now standard equipment required.
areas: 1.8 m x 1.2 m (6 ft x 4 ft)
thickness: 3 cm thick (1 3/16 in) made of hard wood but can be suitable transparent material.

Node: <Node id="for a match, the home team should provide a new ball or 2 good used balls/dummy>" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1"> <Item id="If a new ball is provided, neither team shall use it as practice ball before the game starts. /dummy" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1"> <Item id="If this is provided, the referee selects the one for play the visiting team shall have it as their practice ball. /dummy" alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1">

Node.id: Is coparatively simple to other sports

Item.id: must have a number on the front one on the back
is v. important for players ==> they should fit well have a sole thick enough to cushion the jumping landing that occurs in the game
can be high cut or low cut
